body.data:
SELECT
  s.ID,
  s.NAME_E,
  u.USER_NAME,
  u.MOBILE_NUMBER AS USER_PHONE,
  u.DEVICE_ID,
  u.HOF_ID,
  u.REG_DATE,
  CASE u.FLG_ENABLED WHEN 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS IS_ENABLED,
  s.NATIONALITY_E,
  s.MSTATUS_E,
  s.GENDER_E,
  s.BIRTH_DATE,
  CASE u.FLG_BLOCKED WHEN 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS IS_BLOCKED,
	CASE u.FLG_ADMIN WHEN 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS IS_ADMIN,
  d.PHONE_NUMBER AS DEPENDENT_PHONE,
  d.CREATED_DATE AS DEPENDENT_CREATED_DATE,
	c.DEGREE_ID,
	c.END_DATE AS CONTRACT_EXPIRE_DATE,
	c.EMP_NO,
	c.CNT_ID AS CONTRACT_ID,
	c.COMP_ID,
	c.RC_ID,
	subsImg.IMG AS USER_IMAGE,
	comps.DESC_E AS COMPANY_NAME,
	rec.DESC_E AS INSURANCE_COMP_NAME,
	img_rc.IMG AS Insured_LOGO,
	img_comp.IMG AS COMPANY_LOGO
FROM CORE.VW_APPS_SUBS s
LEFT JOIN COREAPPS.APP_USERS u
  ON s.ID = u.SUBS_ID
LEFT JOIN COREAPPS.DEPENDENTS_PHONE d
  ON d.SUBS_ID = u.HOF_ID
LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_CNT_SUBS c 
  ON c.SUBS_ID = u.SUBS_ID
LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_COMPS comps ON comps.ID = c.COMP_ID
LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_COMPS rec ON rec.ID = c.RC_ID
LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_SUBS_IMG subsImg ON subsImg.REF_ID = u.SUBS_ID
LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_COMP_IMG img_comp ON img_comp.REF_ID = c.COMP_ID
LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_COMP_IMG img_rc ON img_rc.REF_ID = c.RC_ID
WHERE s.ID = {{ appsmith.store.selectedUserId }}
